cards.rules_text:
When Steelbane Sniper enters, choose one -
:: Create a reach Gadget, then attach it to Steelbane Sniper. (It's an Equipment artifact token with equip {2} that grants that ability.)
:: Destroy target artifact creature.

If you would draw a card, you may draw two cards instead.
Whenever you cast a spell, you may copy it. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

As Luxurious Estate enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

Flying
When Granite Harbinger dies, you may search your library for a Nightmare card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Flying, haste
Whenever Hemec Yor attacks, she deals damage to any target equal to the number of spells you've cast this turn.

Mana Smuggler can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
At the beginning of each end step, if you've surveiled this turn, add the top card of your library to your evil plan. (Look at it, then exile it face-down. You may pay {7} once a turn as a sorcery to cast any number of cards in your evil plan without paying their mana costs.)

As Blacklist enters, choose a nonland card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.
Creatures with the chosen name can't attack unless their controller pays {3} for each of those creatures.

When Heart Pounding Action enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an instant, sorcery, or Aura card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
Until your next turn, you choose which creatures attack and block and how those creatures attack and block each combat.

Flash
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may return any number of creatures you control to their owners' hands. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature returned to its owner's hand this way.

Remote Facility enters the battlefield tapped.
When Remote Facility enters, add the top card of your library to your evil plan. (Look at it, then exile it face-down. You may pay {7} once a turn as a sorcery to cast any number of cards in your evil plan without paying their mana costs.)
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

Lifelink, haste
Whenever Calamity's Cohort attacks, exile the top card of defending player's library. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell. Spend only mana from artifacts to cast that spell.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When Smuggler's Cunning enters, surveil 2, then draw a card. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

Endgame (If you control eight or more tapped permanents, enter your endgame for the rest of the game.)
Bodyguard Bruisers gets +2/+2 as long as you're in your endgame.
{T}: Surveil 1. Activate only as a sorcery. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Add the top two cards of your library to your evil plan. (Look at them, then exile them face-down. You may pay {7} once a turn as a sorcery to cast any number of cards in your evil plan without paying their mana costs.)
Create a Gold token. (It's an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Flying
If a nontoken creature an opponent controls would die, instead exile that card and put a +1/+1 counter on Sainted Agent.

Trample
Whenever Blunt Instrument is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you unless it's enchanted or equipped.
{4}, {T}: Tap target creature.
Superweapon Blast deals 7 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

Endgame (If you control eight or more tapped permanents, enter your endgame for the rest of the game.)
{G}, Sacrifice Bankbuster Heavy: Destroy target noncreature permanent. Activate only if you're in your endgame.

Enchant creature
When Uncanny Likeness enters, exile target creature card from a graveyard with mana value less than or equal to enchanted creature's mana value.
Enchanted creature is a copy of the exiled card.

Whenever you cast a spell that targets Agent 107, draw a card.
Whenever Agent 107 attacks, if you've cast three or more spells that targeted him this turn, return up to three target cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw three cards. Discard three cards at the beginning of the next end step.

When Codename: Viridian enters, choose first strike, haste, lifelink, reach, or trample. Create a Gadget of that type, then attach it to her. (It's an Equipment artifact token with equip {2} that grants that ability.)
Noncreature, non-Equipment spells cost {1} more to cast for each permanent attached to Codename: Viridian.

Surveil 3. When you do, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. (To surveil 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

When Brawl Instigator enters, add the top two cards of your library to your evil plan. (Look at them, then exile them face-down. You may pay {7} once a turn as a sorcery to cast any number of cards in your evil plan without paying their mana costs.)
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Brawl Instigator fights up to one target creature.

When World Domination enters, you draw X cards and you lose X life.
At the beginning of your end step, World Domination deals damage to any target equal to the number of noncreature spells you've cast this turn. You gain that much life.

This spell costs {3} less to cast if you've cast another spell that targeted a creature this turn.
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.

Create three 1/1 black Minion creature tokens. Add the top three cards of your library to your evil plan. (Look at them, then exile them face-down. You may pay {7} once a turn as a sorcery to cast any number of cards in your evil plan without paying their mana costs.)
